message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a complete system for real-time aerial cinematography that combines vision-based target estimation, 3D signed-distance mapping, efficient trajectory optimization, and learning-based artistic shot selection. This involves robotics (cs.RO) for the autonomous piloting of the drone, computer vision (cs.CV) for target estimation and occlusion estimation, artificial intelligence (cs.AI) for trajectory optimization and artistic shot selection, computer graphics (cs.GR) for rendering the final footage, and machine learning (cs.LG) for the learning-based shot selection.
